doc:
Jean Aurel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean_Aurel 0 Jean Aurel (6 November 1925 in Rastolita, Romania – 24 August 1996 in Paris, France) was a Romanian-born French film director and scriptwriter. Notably he co-wrote La Femme d'à côté (The Woman Next Door) with François Truffaut and Suzanne Schiffman. Jean_Aurel ( 6_November_1925 in Rastolita , Romania – 24_August_1996 in Paris , France ) was a_Romanian-born_French_film_director_and_scriptwriter . Notably he co-wrote La_Femme_d'_à_côté ( The_Woman_Next_Door_) with François_Truffaut and Suzanne_Schiffman .
